storyInfo: Stories breed stories, which bring out even more stories. In the shadow of a festival banquet, young operators share tales passed down from ancient times.

attributes.content: What is it, Morte?
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: (Lies limply on the sofa.)
attributes.name: Morte

attributes.content: You're still hungry?
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Today is a holiday, everyone's having fun.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Even the evil spirits are hiding.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: I saw so many people crying while I got my food at the banquet.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Can't you eat those?
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Maybe you're getting picky.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: This morning, the Doctor told me there would be a banquet here.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: There would be food, friends, and all kinds of things we don't usually get—
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: You're asking me if I'm happy?
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: I... don't understand.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: The emotions in this place are too strange.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: They've been so rich lately.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: I don't understand some of them.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Like what we saw just now, laughing and drinking.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Talking for a while, then unstoppable tears.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Laughing and crying.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: The combination of joy and sadness makes my head hurt.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Nnn, this is also the only thing I understand.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Morte wouldn't like these emotions.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Another rip?
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Okay, it's not that bad.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Get some apples for me, I'll get the other materials.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Go on, don't let the stuffing in your tummy fall out.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Don't wave your knife around either. Doctor will get mad.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: (Nods)
attributes.name: Morte

attributes.content: Go on.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Ah, am I disturbing you, Shamare?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: I-I just saw you writing for a long time without actually writing anything, so I got curious...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Am I bothering... your work?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I'm sorry!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Um, well, I just finished eating and want to read here... May I?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Go ahead.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Thanks, Shamare! Hehe.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Phew, I should be able to let down all my tails on this big sofa— Alright.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Aah... that's better~
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Woo~~
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: You're back?
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: (Whispering) Morte, give an apple to Suzuran.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: (Nods)
attributes.name: Morte

attributes.content: Haa—
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Eh, Morte?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Is this... for me?!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Thank you, Shamare!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Thank you, Morte!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Wuh?!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: It's sweet!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Mmm.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: It's sweet and sour. The temperature is just right, a little cold but not cold enough to hurt my teeth.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Nnnnnng—
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Haa— So happy~
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Ah, I should keep the apple core and find a rubbish bin later.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Morte, are you going to pitch it for me?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Okay, here.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Shamare, aren't you eating?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Later.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I won't bother you then.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I'll be reading here.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Hmm—Last time I got to—
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Here.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: 'Dusk Beauty Flying to the Moon'.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Once upon a time, there was a gentle and kind girl named Dusk Beauty who lived in Yan——'
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: (Diligently reads the story, one word at a time).
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: (Puts her pen down).
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Morte, apple.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: (Slowly gnaws on the apple).
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: ——To commemorate the distant Dusk Beauty, on the same day every year, people would offer up her favorite food. As time passed, this day became an important festival in Yan.'
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: So that's where it comes from—
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: So that's where it comes from—
Eh?! Popukar? And Miss Mousse?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Hiya.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Hello, Suzuran.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Why are you all here and not at the banquet? There's a lot of delicious food from Yan there.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I'm already full. I saw Suzuran telling stories on my way back to the dorm, so I came over to listen.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: I also came to hear the story! And also, um, to look after the kitties. They're getting rambunctious.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Kitties?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: They're over there...
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: There? Shamare?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Ah, it's true!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The kitties really like Shamare and Morte!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Mm...
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Meow~Purrr—
attributes.name: Kitties

attributes.content: (Tugs on Suzuran's sleeve).
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: That story just now, could you tell it again, Suzuran?
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: I came late and missed some of it.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Me too...
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Ah— Okay!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Um, it might take a long time to read the whole thing again, so I'll summarize.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: This is a fairy tale from Yan. The protagonist is a girl named Dusk Beauty.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: She was living a happy life with her husband.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Until one day, her husband went missing.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: She must have been very sad.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Yes, the book says Dusk Beauty searched everywhere for her husband, but no one knew where he was.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: She went home and cried under the willow tree her husband had planted himself.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: A wise elder in the village saw Dusk Beauty weeping everyday and came up with an idea.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The old man said—
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: *Cough* *cough*... Mhmm.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: 'Child, you have a pair of sharp eyes that can see thousands of miles away. Why not ascend the mountain to the west?'
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: 'From there you can gaze upon the wide earth. Only there will you have a chance to find your husband.'
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Dusk Beauty agreed with the wise elder's suggestion, and decided to leave the town and head to the mountain at the edge of the land.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: This mountain, the tallest of them all, was called Mount T'ien by the people of Yan.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: That sounds so cool.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: The meaning of Mount Sky is 'a mountain as tall as the skies.' There is no mountain taller than it in all of Yan.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: After much tribulation, Dusk Beauty reached the mountain peak and looked out over the vast land. But after three days and three nights, even as her eyes reddened from the strain, there was no sign of her husband.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: With years of her effort ending up fruitless, Dusk Beauty could not help but weep, and her tears flowing down the mountain formed a river.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: How sad...
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Mom said I was like that when I cried as a kid.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The surging tears shocked the gods within the mountains. They couldn't believe the river which had appeared out of nowhere.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Upon seeing the source of the river, they were even more surprised. The gods decided to send their leader, the god of Mount Sky, to talk with the girl.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The kind god listened to Dusk Beauty's story and pitied her. Thus, the god of Mount Sky said:
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: 'Lofty heights of Mount Sky, lie yet dwarfed by the twin moons. Ascend thee to the moons, and thy husband shall thee find soon.'
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Oh, sorry. It's sort of poetic and old-tymey, isn't it? Let me explain.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: It means that even though the mountain was very tall, its height could not compare to the twin moons in the sky. So, if she could fly to the moons, she would definitely be able to find her husband.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Dusk Beauty accepted the mountain god's suggestion, and asked for help. After the gods discussed it, they taught her a way...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: One night, everyone was going about their business as usual, when suddenly, a bright light rose from the western mountains and rushed towards the moon.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: This light became brighter and brighter, brighter and brighter, and at one point it even became brighter than the moon.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Finally, this light landed on the moon, and a big and brilliant sparkle rose out of it. The night sky grew bright, and it was hard to even see the stars.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: (Whisper) Mousse, can we see fireworks like that now?!
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: (Whisper) Of course not!
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Upon seeing such a thing, everyone panicked, thinking it meant something terrible.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: But the elder recalled the story of Dusk Beauty and told everyone this meant she had found her husband. He told them not to be afraid, and to celebrate instead.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The people were convinced, so they brought out their wine and food, and celebrated the departure of Dusk Beauty.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: From then on, everyone would bring food and gather together to feast once a year. They put the foods that Dusk Beauty liked on an altar.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: They did it every year, without fail.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: As time passed, it became a traditional festival.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Even after Dusk Beauty left, the river continued to flow down from Mount Sky, so the people decided to name the river after her, calling it the Dusk River.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Later on, the village slowly developed into a city. The edge of the city was next to the Dusk River, so naturally the city was called Dusk City.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Is that why there's so much yummy food today?
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Actually, today is the day of a Higashi festival as well.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The shrines will be very busy today. Dad's always swamped the whole day.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Though the most lively shrine is always Miss Tsukinogi's shrine. They say the god of her shrine is the chief god, so they have a huge festival, with a lot of people.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: People from all over Higashi travel to Miss Tsukinogi's shrine.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Are there similar stories from Higashi then?
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: There are.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Well, it's not really a story, it's actually part of the liturgy. Dad's always reciting it during the ceremonies, he even has to dance along with the music at the same time. It's really fun.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The story goes something like this.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: There was once a poor, old couple who lived working in the fields. One day, all of a sudden, a woman descended from the sky.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The woman handed a jeweled pot to the old man. When he opened it, there were more gold and riches than he'd ever seen in his whole life.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The woman asked the old man to accept the treasures, and to help her look for a husband. The treasures would be a gift to the old man in return.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The old man brought the woman home and discussed the matter with his wife. Upon hearing such a thing, she was ecstatic.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Thus, the old couple hired people to repair their home and invited the woman to stay.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Then, they spread the news about the woman looking for a husband.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The news passed quickly from person to person, and soon everyone in Higashi knew about it.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: But the woman was very picky and most of the hopefuls failed to catch her eye. For those that did, she would ask them to retrieve a treasure for her. If they succeeded, she would marry them.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Do the people of the East all marry like that?
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: They used to, long ago.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Now... It's hard to say.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: At least, Dad and Mom didn't get married like that.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Mmm, let's continue.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The woman never asked for the same item twice, but no one was able to fulfill her requests.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: 'As long as you can bring me one treasure, I will become your wife.'
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Many ears heard these words.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: But even the important people from the capital couldn't do it.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: There were even five dignitaries from the capital who asked for her hand in marriage, and were only too helpless in the face of her requests.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: One of them even lost his life search of the treasure.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: After that, even though everyone was still interested in the woman, no one dared to court her.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Scary...
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Three brothers, all hunters who lived on a mountain, heard this news and were intrigued.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The eldest and second brother were interested, but the third brother believed it was just a ploy to trick people.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: But he couldn't convince his brothers and so he set out with them to travel to the old man's house.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Unexpectedly, the woman didn't turn them away, and instead gave them her requests.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: 'As long as you can bring me one treasure, I will become your wife.'
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Mhmm.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The woman asked the eldest brother for a never-melting ice crystal, from the far north.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: From the second brother, she asked for an everlasting flame from the south.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: She would marry whoever brought her the treasure first.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Just as the third brother was to listen to his request, the woman fell silent.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Leaving the old man's house, the two brothers found the requests extraordinarily difficult and impossible to complete.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: But neither of them were willing to return to a life of hardship in the mountains.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: After some discussion, they decided on a deadline.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Three years.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: After three years, no matter if they found the treasure or not, they would return to this place.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The third brother told his older brothers not to let the woman bewitch them.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: But his pleas fell on deaf ears and his brothers went their separate ways as soon as they had agreed on the deadline.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Feeling resentful as he was confused by his elders, the third brother left the village as well.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: So, did they find their treasures?
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Three years later, the eldest brother and second brother reunited in the village.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Both of them had found their treasures.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Wow, so they could go and get married!
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Over the course of their treasure hunt, the both of them had become famous and important people.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: But they had pledged their loyalty to different lords, in different factions.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: With their treasures in hand, the two brothers led armies that clashed against each other.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The entire village became a battlefield, and with both sides going on the offensive, they both suffered major losses.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Many of the villagers tried to hide or escape. Refusing to leave their piles of riches, the old couple ended up killed along with the rest of the villagers who stayed behind.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: However, there was no sign of the woman.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: In the end, the two brothers died on the very spot they made their agreement three years prior.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: They're brothers, why did they end up fighting each other?!
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: After the leaders died, both sides continued to send reinforcements into the area.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Soldiers were deployed, fortifications were built, fortresses were erected.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The war in that place never ended.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The two fortresses were combined together and called Nito-jo.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Between the north and south fortresses lies the ruins of the village...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: And countless dead...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Of course, normally only the first few parts are recited in the ceremony. The later parts are only enacted during the great ceremonies once every few years.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: As for why the people of Higashi like this story so much, I'm not really sure either.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The third brother and the sky woman don't come up again?
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Oh, they do. Let me think.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Hm, there are a few versions of the ending.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: One says that after the village was destroyed, someone tried looking for the riches in the old man's house, but he found only bones.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: So he told everyone that the woman was a fairy who had descended to Higashi with great expectations of the land below only to see the greed and tyranny of the people. She returned to heaven disappointed.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Another version is that this was a trickster fairy, and it wasn't the first tragedy she caused, and it wouldn't be the last.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: After witnessing the fate of his elder brothers, the third brother decided to avenge them by killing the fairy.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: But he had no way to travel to heaven, and the fairy taunted him from the sky.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: In the end, the third brother became a ghost who wanders around Higashi, forever searching for a way to take revenge against the fairy.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Morte, come here and let me patch you up.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Meow—
attributes.name: Kitties

attributes.content: Mm...
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: I think I heard a story like this when I was little...
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Do you know any Victorian fairy tales?
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: I don't know many either...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Let me tell it, then.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Alright, another story!
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: I hope it's a happy story where no one dies this time.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Ah...
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: (Begins patching the hole in Morte).
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: The story goes like this——
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Ahem...
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Once upon a time, there was a rich Victorian kingdom. The king of this country had a pair of twins.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: When they were born, the most respected caster in the country came to congratulate the king on the birth of the prince and princess, and offered a prophecy:
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: 'With the guidance of the divine light, both will have bright futures.'
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: The king was extremely pleased and bequeathed upon the caster many treasures and riches. But when he asked the caster to explain the prophecy, he fell silent and left the castle instead.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Years later, the prince and princess were grown, but the wise king had fallen ill with a terrible sickness and was bedridden. The doctors said it was a terminal illness, and that only the Divine Originium could save the king.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: All the warriors from across the land set out to search for the Originium, including the prince and princess, disguised as adventurers.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: They had to join the quest to save their father.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: The two traveled together, searching the deepest caves and crossing the wildest forests.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: (Miss Mousse has a very different way of speaking when she's telling a story.)
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: They stopped a scheme by an evil witch, they defeated vicious barbarians, all in search of the smallest clue that could lead them to the Originium.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: What an adventure!
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Finally, they had a lead. Following the clues, the brother and sister climbed up a tall mountain. At the mountain peak, they found a monster——
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: ——And its nest, filled to the brim with treasure.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: This monster could soar through the skies. Its scaly armor repelled all manner of weapons, and from its maw it breathed a fearsome flame. The siblings could not even harm it.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: (Stops the needle and thread in her hand).
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: But they were able to use the monster's greed against it, luring it into its own nest.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: There, the two fought against the monster for ages. In the end, the brother fell unconscious from his injuries and the sister was left to face the monster alone.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Unexpectedly, the monster did not press the attack. Instead, it opened its huge mouth asked why they had entered its nest.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: The princess answered the question honestly:
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: She needed the Divine Originium to save her father's life.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: The monster nodded and pointed to the cave full of treasure, giving her permission to look for the Originium herself.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Not long after, her brother woke up. The monster asked the same question.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: The brother gave the same answer as his sister, and the monster let him pass.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: But when faced with treasure that dwarfed even his country's wealth, the brother changed his mind.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: He stuffed his pockets full of treasure and sneaked out of the cave before his sister could notice.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Bad guy!
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: The sister searched through the piles of treasures for a long time before discovering the Divine Originium that seemed rather dull amongst the glow of the other treasures. Carrying out the Originium, she realized that her brother had disappeared.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: She searched through the entire cave and even worked up the courage to ask the monster of her brother's whereabouts, but the monster merely grinned and said nothing.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: If I had a brother like that——!
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Calm down, Popukar! It's just a story!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Standing on the mountain peak and looking at the two royals in the distance, the monster let out a roar of satisfaction. The Originium crystals on its body shined a divine light that flickered along with the monster's every breath.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: After that, the princess presented the Originium and the king instantly recovered his vitality.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: He granted a great reward to the princess and even gave her a necklace made from the Divine Originium. Alas, even after the king was cured, he continued to grow.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: More limbs, a larger brain! The king eventually turned into a monster and began slaughtering people indiscriminately!
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: The country's knights banded together and killed the monstrous king. The princess was also charged and sent to the gallows.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: The Originium necklace around her neck shined with a gentle light up until her death.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: In the chaos, the old caster who gave the prophecy to the king all those years ago appeared before the princess and her Divine Originium, only to whisk them away.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: With the end of the royal bloodline, the entire country fell into chaos.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: What about the bad guy brother?!
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: In another country far, far away, the brother heard what happened.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Though he shed tears of guilt, he continued to cram his gullet with the finest foods in the world.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: With the wealth he took from the monster's cave, he had become a noble in another land, and lived out his days in luxury.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: That's unfair!
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Oh, I get it.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Fairy tales are all monsters that eat all the good people.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Ah...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Shamare is from Siracusa, right? Are there any similar stories over there?
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: (Continues sewing Morte).
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: ...Umm, what about you, Suzuran?
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Long ago, there was a tribe that lived in a valley surrounded by seven hills.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: The leader of the tribe, She-wolf, had six children.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Each of them took one of the hills, and fought against each other for food.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: A hundred years later, each child had established their own tribe, and the fighting continued as before.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: One of the tribes could not defeat the others, and went to snatch food from She-wolf.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Not wanting to fight her own child, She-wolf leapt into the sky and became the Moonshadow.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Whenever the moon is covered in black, all Lupos should remember the graciousness and rage of She-wolf.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: So that's where the Moonshadow came from.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The other tribes came to their senses after losing She-wolf.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: They exiled the worst of them, and made some rules.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: From then on, Lupos stopped separating themselves into tribes, and called each other family instead.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Six families each took one hill, with the last dedicated to She-wolf.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Any Lupo who broke the rules would be severely punished by the Sette Colli Council and Sette Colli City.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Does this city still exist?
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: But this city was taken over by a larger family a hundred years ago.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Only the story and the rules were passed on.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: The end.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: You guys go ahead.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: (Continues sewing Morte).
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Umm...
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: You all told such good stories, I wanna share one too.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: It's a story Orchid told me.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Can I?
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Of course, go ahead!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Yes, you can do it!
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Let me think...
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Once upon a time, there was a really amazing, umm, wax figure... Right, wax figure!
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: (Whisper) Did she mess up?
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: (Whisper) Let's just listen for now.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: (Whisper) Okay.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: (Continues sewing Morte).
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: The wax figure could make lots of stuff. Everyone called him a great inventor.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: But the wax figure was always very sad.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: He wanted to find a Forte to match with.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Lots of people brought their daughters to him, but he didn't like any of them.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: So the wax figure stayed single.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Until one day! The wax figure realized!
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Since there wasn't a bride for him anywhere in the whole world, he could just make one himself!
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: So he spent a reeeaallly long time, using all his savings.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: And finally, he made a bride!
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: He loved the Forte bride he made a super duper lot, and didn't want anyone else to see her at all.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: (Whisper) Okay, I get it.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: (Whisper) Yeah.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The king locked the wax figure up and brought his soldiers to the tower, ready to snatch the bride for himself.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: After a couple days, they let the wax figure go.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: He asked people where his bride was, and they told him:
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: When the king and the soldiers went inside the tower, the sky rumbled with thunder and flashed with lightning. Wax oil flowed down from the top of the tower, covering the king and his men.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: The soldiers who escaped said the melted bride was swimming in the wax oil, using wax to kill all the bad guys.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Then the country had no leader, but everyone thought that the wax figure inventor was very smart and asked him to become the new king.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Wait...
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Not wax figure, he was a Forte inventor!
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: They asked the Forte inventor to become the new king!
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Ahhhh...... I got the beginning all wrong...... Should I start over...?
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: It's okay, I understood it all.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Come on, and then what happened?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: A-And then...?
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Um, and then...
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: And then the inventor became a good king and invented many things. Everyone loved him.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: But he always hid in the palace's garden and never came out.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Because he was trying to make another bride.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: But every time he tried, he failed.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: None of the brides were as perfect as the first bride.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: In the end, the inventor grew old in the garden full of brides and never came out again.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: The people who loved him buried him in the garden, along with all his brides.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Aww, finally a story with a good ending.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: I asked Orchid where the wax bride went.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: She said the wax bride was stuck in the tower after it collapsed.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: (She probably melted.)
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: But she always wanted to go back to the inventor.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Maybe one day the bride will get to be with her groom again.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: I like warm and fuzzy stories like this.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Popukar, where are you? It's bedtime!
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Orchid, over here!
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Sorry... Orchid says I have to go home and sleep.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: I'll see you again later.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Bye bye!
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: I'm feeling sleepy too...
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Kitties, lets go. Let's not bother Shamare anymore.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Meow—Meoww—
attributes.name: Kitties

attributes.content: Stop that, behave.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Meow—
attributes.name: Kitties

attributes.content: Thanks for the stories, everyone. Good night.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: I should go home too.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Dad will cry if I'm not in bed by ten.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Even though Dad isn't here...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Aren't you going home, Shamare? It's already very late.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I still have things to do.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Well then, good night, Shamare.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Good night.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: (Pulls the tear closed).
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Done.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Morte, give me the last apple.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: (Brushes the page using a finger dipped in apple juice).
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: There's the symbol.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Morte, lie on the book.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: The symbol is imprinted and we're done.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Let's go home.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Oh, I see it.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Let's give the book back to Suzuran.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: You still want another story?
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: That's not like you.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: You're asking why all the stories end like that?
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Mm...
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Think about it, Morte.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Think about our world.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Think about what you eat, and where we used to live.
attributes.name: Shamare

attributes.content: Does it make sense now?
attributes.name: Shamare
